name: Doki Doki Kaiju Cat City
description:
Giant cat Kaijus have been overpopulating the city because of Valentine's Day. It's up to you and a friend to become MechaMeow and use your sick moves to defeat all the Kaijus together!

Though originally a 2 player game that uses D-Force dance pads as the controllers, DDKCC has also been modified to play on any standard QWERTY keyboard.

Controls

  • Left Player: W, A, S, D
  • Right Player: I, J, K, L
  • Start: Space Bar
  • Quit: Escape

Supports 16:9 aspect ratio.

Credits

♡ Programming - Angel Rodriguez

♡ Art/Design - Rana AlRifai

♡ Art - Joseph Schmittau

Made in 48 hours for UCF's Game Dev Knights Valenjam 2018 ♡
